about_the_game:
Overview

Catching Spirits, the 2D brawler game that will break the balance in your friendship. Engage in a frantic three-player chase, where each player will embodies a Mediator and fight to defend the colors of one of the three great Tribes of Creation, Destruction or Preservation. Balance caution and risk to be the first player to catch your prey three times. Choose a magical power at the start of each game to throw energy balls, create protective walls or teleport over short distances.

Three tribes, three ways of life : Creation, Destruction and Preservation. Which tribe will you fight for?

Play local and online

Invite your friends to play on your couch in your living room or play online against players from all around the world.

An innovative game mechanic

Catching Spirits is based on a triangular confrontation mechanic. Hunt your prey but watch out for your predator...

A shamanic universe

Fight in three unique worlds and become the champion of the three tribes tournament.

The "Mediators"

Play as one of the legendary heroes of Catching Spirits and fight for one of the three great tribes: The tribe of Creation, Destruction or Preservation.

Easy to learn, hard to master

Easy will be to run, jump, double jump, climb walls to catch your prey but hard will be to master good timings and dodge enemy attacks.

XP and levels

As you play, progress through the game and gain experience. Unlock numerous rewards, hero skins, summoning altars, screams of grief, and a lot more...

Regular Updates

New content is added regularly with new worlds, characters or mechanics, to make the game experience even richer.

Lively graphics and a great soundtrack

Immerse yourself in the magical world of Catching Spirits, with hand-drawn 2D graphics and an enchanting soundtrack.

Keyboard or Gamepad

Play with a gamepad or the keyboard. All means are good to win, even if we recommend a gamepad :D
